bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: No, I didn't. And it pisses me off, okay?
sentences.chinese: 是的，我没有，而这吓坏我了，知道吗？

sentences.english: The child was frightened by the hedgehog. The father rolled it out of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 孩子被这只刺猥吓坏了，父亲把它从花园里弄了出去。

sentences.english: Frightened by that, he felt ill right after returning home.
sentences.chinese: 他被吓坏了，回到家后，便一病不起。

sentences.english: So everyone's freaking out. And insisting I go get vaccinated.
sentences.chinese: 所以这把所有人都吓坏了，他们都让我赶快去打疫苗。

sentences.english: I don't like clowns - they really freak me out.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢小丑，他们真的会吓坏我。

sentences.english: I am frightened, and hurriedly fled the bedroom of my sister Barbara's .
sentences.chinese: 我吓坏了，赶紧逃向了我妹妹芭芭拉的卧室中。

sentences.english: I was appal(l)ed at the news.
That explosion scared the living daylights out of me.
The recall many years ago, terrified parents quarrel Su Shu eues things.
sentences.chinese: 翩帕回想起多年前，父母吵架吓坏苏舒薇的事情。

sentences.english: Zacharias was terrified, but Gabriel quickly tried to calm him down.
sentences.chinese: 撒加利亚吓坏了，但是加百列马上使他安静下来。

sentences.english: I called her to share my findings and she was, understandably, creeped out.
sentences.chinese: 我打电话告诉她我的发现，可想而知，她吓坏了。

sentences.english: The old woman is very ugly. When the children see her, they are frightened.
sentences.chinese: 老婆婆长得很丑，孩子们看到她时都吓坏了。

sentences.english: You must answer it; and that violence does not alarm me.
sentences.chinese: 你必须回答，你那种狂暴并不能吓坏我。

sentences.english: I was petrified to see a huge rhino bearing down on me.
sentences.chinese: 看见一头大犀牛朝我冲过来我都吓坏了。

sentences.english: Said, pointing to DE wang class is Zhao Chuanji frightened XinPingGui Zhao Chuanji.
sentences.chinese: 指着王班德是说赵传奇吓坏了辛平贵跟赵传奇。

sentences.english: I was afraid that a high call will take old man frightened, she will have advanced in age.
sentences.chinese: 我真怕那一声高叫会把老人吓坏了，她必竟年事已高。
